jobDescription: Please contact Meera Makam at 925 627 4935 or email mmakam@ascentsg.com for any questions  Day to Day Responsibilities of this Position and Description of Project:  Analyze and document all aspects (process and data flows) of several time consuming manual processes whose function is to obtain and assemble data that is used as input into the calculation of incentives as well as sales/management reporting.  The processes are sourcing information from external systems (including NetX360/Pershing and Salesforce). Utilizing the user interfaces of these systems, transactions are manually inspected and evaluated to determine some key data attributes.  ? Document the current processes, (sources, inputs, outputs, business logic, etc.), for extracting and assembling the data and the creation of outputs.  ? Define and document all the data that is extracted from the various systems, including the relationships between the data.  ? Understand and document all business logic required to use the data.  The analysis will encompass both process and data flows, and will identify opportunities for process improvement and automation.  Experience with financial services and brokerage (business and data) is preferred, but not required.
